pullRequest.title: std.dl: default() function.
pullRequest.bodyText: Function that returns the default value of a type.

commit.message:
std.dl: default() function.

Function that returns the default value of a type.

nodes.bodyText: would be nice to get rid of these spurious diffs, but I don't have a concrete proposal.
